Text:
As mentioned on several torrents already, the ES shoot from August 1, 2012 is bugged on all versions we have found. Playback stops about half way through. There are several copies out on torrent but I have not seen one that is fixed version yet.

When a confirmed working version is out, you will find it here at Merzedes@tpb :D
How about a Kink.com Sandra Romain pack some time? A lot of her old stuff - mostly with 4xxx and 5xxx IDs - is almost impossible to get these days. I'm sure I'm not the only one missing a lot.
